note.comment:
Shop System Plugins - Terms of use

This terms of use regulates warranty and liability between Wirecard Central Eastern Europe (subsequently referred to as WDCEE) and it's contractual partners (subsequently referred to as customer or customers) which are related to the use of plugins provided by WDCEE.

The Plugin is provided by WDCEE free of charge for it's customers and must be used for the purpose of WDCEE's payment platform integration only. It explicitly is not part of the general contract between WDCEE and it's customer. The plugin has successfully been tested under specific circumstances which are defined as the shopsystem's standard configuration (vendor's delivery state). The Customer is responsible for testing the plugin's functionality before putting it into production enviroment.

The customer uses the plugin at own risk. WDCEE does not guarantee it's full functionality neither does WDCEE assume liability for any disadvantage related to the use of this plugin. By installing the plugin into the shopsystem the customer agrees to the terms of use. Please do not use this plugin if you do not agree to the terms of use!

shop_id.label: Shop ID
shop_id.comment: Only needed if enabled by QPay

display_text.label: Displayed Text
display_text.comment: Text which is shown together with order data (optional)

logo_url.label: Logo URL
logo_url.comment: URL pointing to the image of logo (optional; use relative path)

service_url.label: Service Page URL
service_url.comment: URL pointing to the service page (use relative path)

background_color.label: Background color
background_color.comment: Background color of payment form after redirection. RGB, for example: F5F5F5

send_additional_data.label: Send additional consumer information
send_additional_data.comment: Include additional consumer data to redirect request. (e.g. billing address information)

display_text.label: Displayed Text
display_text.comment: Text which is shown together with order data (optional)

logo_url.label: Logo URL
logo_url.comment: URL pointing to the image of logo (optional; use relative path)

service_url.label: Service Page URL
service_url.comment: URL pointing to the service page (use relative path)

background_color.label: Background color
background_color.comment: Background color of payment form after redirection. RGB, for example: F5F5F5

send_additional_data.label: Send additional consumer information
send_additional_data.comment: Include additional consumer data to redirect request. (e.g. billing address information)

note.comment:
Shop System Plugins - Terms of use

This terms of use regulates warranty and liability between Wirecard Central Eastern Europe (subsequently referred to as WDCEE) and it's contractual partners (subsequently referred to as customer or customers) which are related to the use of plugins provided by WDCEE.

The Plugin is provided by WDCEE free of charge for it's customers and must be used for the purpose of WDCEE's payment platform integration only. It explicitly is not part of the general contract between WDCEE and it's customer. The plugin has successfully been tested under specific circumstances which are defined as the shopsystem's standard configuration (vendor's delivery state). The Customer is responsible for testing the plugin's functionality before putting it into production enviroment.

The customer uses the plugin at own risk. WDCEE does not guarantee it's full functionality neither does WDCEE assume liability for any disadvantage related to the use of this plugin. By installing the plugin into the shopsystem the customer agrees to the terms of use. Please do not use this plugin if you do not agree to the terms of use!

useSeamless.label: Seamless
useSeamless.comment: The Payment Method will be integrated Seamless into the Payment Checkout Step.
